attributes.action: Allow 16-18 year old students just outside the London boundary to Free travel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petition to request FREE travel on londons' busses and trams to students in Full-time eductation, to those just outside the london boundary.

Isn't it unfair that only Londoners are offered this scheme to persuade them to stay on at college? Should we not get the same benefits if we travel in London but live just outside of it?
 
This is merely asking for the same rights as so-called "london borough" students receive. 

So anyone living just outside the London Boroughs, please make your voice heard.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
